For %s %s, fill in the input field and press the button edit number black \"adding a number to \" Number %s is added Select a priority If the filter and application conditions match mutually, from the black and white lists, the priority will be selected according to this parameter Priority: Blacklist match criteria Whitelist match criteria Add filter Select All Hidden %s calls blocked To add a filter, enter the numbers in the input field, check the conditions for applying (if necessary) and click the confirm button To add the %s filter, check the application conditions (if necessary) and press the confirm button To edit the filter %s, change the application conditions and press the confirm button No blacklist matches No whitelist matches May be %s %s numbers from your contact list Due to a different priority, there cannot be %s %s numbers from your contact list Please wait. Data is being updated. Log in With google account Or login with email Email Password Register Continue Continue without account Sign up with email Name Repeat password Sign up Select the application language: Select an app theme: If you select the background mode, the blocking will be performed even with the application closed. Otherwise, blocking will be done only when the application is running. Select an operation mode Select application conditions If no application conditions are selected, the application will block numbers that exactly match the entered number. Please note that incoming calls contain a country code.
